data.title: 2024 NBA Finals Recap: The Boston Celtics Defeat The Dallas Mavericks in 5 Games
meta_keywords: 2024 NBA Finals Recap: The Boston Celtics Defeat The Dallas Mavericks in 5 Games
data.meta_description: The Boston Celtics win a record 18th title defeating the Dallas Mavericks in the 2024 NBA Finals.
data.text:
The battle for the 2024 NBA Finals championship is over as the Boston Celtics defeated the Dallas Mavericks in the best of seven series, 4-1. The NBA Finals were presented by YouTube TV and aired LIVE on ABC. In what turned out to be another thrilling battle between two of the NBA's elite teams, fans could watch every moment live on the ABC app from your smartphone and tablet (iOS and Android), computer on ABC.com and connected devices (Roku, AppleTV and Amazon Fire TV). As is the case with all live sports on ABC, just sign in, select your TV provider and WATCH! See the final score for each game of the 2024 NBA Finals below and click on the links for a full summary as well.

Game 1 - Thursday, June 6

Boston Celtics 107, Dallas Mavericks 89

Game 2 - Sunday, June 9

Boston Celtics 105, Dallas Mavericks 98

Game 3 - Wednesday, June 12

Boston Celtics 106, Dallas Mavericks 99 (Boston leads series 3-0)

Game 4 - Friday, June 14

Dallas Mavericks 122, Boston Celtics 84 (Boston leads series 3-1)

Game 5 - Monday, June 17

Boston Celtics 106, Dallas Mavericks 88 (Boston wins series 4-1)
